refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: systemd-devlinkd is a system service that manages devlink devices. It detects and configures devlink objects as they appear.

systemd-devlinkd will manage devlink objects for which it finds a .devlink file with an appropriate [Kind] and [Match*] sections, see systemd.devlink5. Any objects not matched by one of the .devlink files will be ignored.
When systemd-devlinkd exits, it leaves devlink object configuration intact. This makes it possible to transition from the initrd and to restart the service without causing distruption.

refsect1.title: Configuration Files
refsect1.para: The configuration files are read from the files located in the system devlink directory /usr/lib/systemd/devlink, the volatile runtime devlink directory /run/systemd/devlink and the local administration devlink directory /etc/systemd/devlink.
Devlink objects are configured in .devlink files, see systemd.devlink5.
